articles.author: Nur Hikmah Md Ali, Lee Ying Shan
articles.title: Asian defense stocks extend rally as Venezuela tensions linger, markets mixed - CNBC
articles.description: Investors continued to assess ongoing geopolitical tensions following the U.S.′ attack on Venezuela.
articles.content: Asian defense stocks rallied for a second straight session Tuesday, even as the region traded mixed, with investors assessing geopolitical risks after the U.S. attack on Venezuela and capture of oust… [+1329 chars]
